snippet.title: Earth Defence Force 2025 - PS3/X360 - Call the EDF! (Trailer)
snippet.description:
The destruction is back in the largest insect infestation to hit earth since 2017! Take your sneak peek into all the action with this new trailer for Earth Defense Force 2025 from D3Publisher. 

Watch as the Ranger, Air Raider, Fencer and Wing Diver blast through the city and annihilate hoards of giant bugs in this brand new never before seen trailer and take a closer look at the Ravagers extermination with these new screenshots featuring the online multiplayer mode of the game!

Coming to the Xbox 360 and PlayStation®3 on February 21st, Earth Defense Force 2025 puts players in charge of saving humanity from a massive invasion of monstrous bugs and robots.

For more information, please visit your local Namco Bandai website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
